name: lucky-voucher-system
description: Lucky Voucher System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.setup-env: if [ ! -f .env ]; then cp .env.example .env; echo 'Created .env file from .env.example. Please update with your values.'; fi
scripts.build: npm run setup-env && npm run install-all && npm run build-frontend
scripts.dev: npm run setup-env && concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
